sent.orig: Separately on the beam element domain and the domain MUSIC algorithm comparison.
sent.trans: 分别对波束域和阵元域MUSIC算法进行比较。

sent.orig: Extended-order cross-correlation matrix based MUSIC method and its performance in non-Gaussian and color noise are discussed.
sent.trans: 讨论了一种基于正弦信号扩阶互相关矩阵的MUSIC算法及其在非高斯有色噪声下的性能。

sent.orig: The voice mode is surely a low frequency rolloff, so use the lowest number music mode.
sent.trans: “Voice”模式是一个完全的低频滚降，所以用最小级数的“Music”模式。

sent.orig: The mathematics model of MUSIC at subarray level was proposed and simplified array manifolds were adopted.
sent.trans: 提出了子阵级MUSIC的数学模型并应用了简化的阵列流形。

sent.orig: Computer simulation experiments with MUSIC algorithm demonstrate the above conclusion is corrective.
sent.trans: 结合MUSIC算法完成了方位信息的提取并进行了计算机仿真实验，证明了结论的正确性。
